title: The Dummerer
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Ollie Martin
brief_description: Gothic melodrama, which makes dramatic and economical use of empty frames, overlapping sound and striking images to tell its story of a faith healer’s attempt to de-traumatise and restore the speech of a dumb young man. The results are sensational.
